entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 10:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.4°C
Wind: SE 32 km/h gust 42 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except 80 over exposed coastal sections this morning and early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 70 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except 80 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
